name: CANDR (GameJam)
description:
A game between cops and robbers.
You play as a cop in a shopping mall.

made with very little time for the Community Game Jam
Theme: "The Game is a Lie"

Controls with mouse and keyboard.
Game starts with a simple tutorial.

Asset and tools used:

  • Unity 2018
  • ProBuilder(included in unity)
  • TextMeshPro(included inunity)
  • freesound (sorry) : https://freesound.org/people/joedeshon/sounds/78508/
  • freesound (sorry) : https://freesound.org/people/leonelmail/sounds/429068/
  • Intro music made with: https://www.beepbox.co

its a short and simple game, hope it all works. I failed to upload the bakedversion and its not really balanced.
